div.p:
Curia balliuorum dicti burgi tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxj die aprilis anno quosupra

The samyn day the action' movit and persevit be the procuratouris of Arnald'
vanstakinburghe' aganis Alexander angosone Dauid strachin peter futhes
of certane Somes contenit in the ak maid' obefor is continevit with
consent of bath the partiis to friday that next cumis be preiudice
ony party

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit friday that next cumis
to patrik grige to ansuer to the procuratouris of vmquhile Arnald'
vanstakinburghe for the wranguis' haldin fra him of x Sanct
Androuis guthlingis

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit Androw nachty
sergeand' to warne Jonhne thomsone to comper one friday
that next cumis as the thrid day to ansuer' to the procuratouris
of vanstakingburghe for the haldin fra him be ane obligacion
iiij li' g' xvj s' g' and vij g' and for his parte of ane vthir lettre
obligatouris iij li' g' and v s' g'

The saide day Agnes baxtar follouit sere Jhon' ruthirfurd' knicht
for the wranguis' haldin fra hir' of x merkis Scottis money
quhilkis he denyit and in continent the saide action was put to
the decisione of ane assis' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aithe
Suorne fand' and deliuerit be the moutht of Alexander chamer off
murchile the saide sere Jhone ruthirfurd' quyt of hir' chal
lance and scho in amerciament of the court et cetera

The xxv day of Aprile the yer' forsaide Williame Watson'
Sone to Thome Watsone in the gonellis come Souerte be his
hand' vphaldin to Alexander Rede aldirman and Dauid mar' bailyhe
to pay his fadir taxte extentit in the taxt billis and his amerciamentis
fra the heide courtis for this yer' bigane

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem secundo die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The saide day peter futhes gravntit that he borrouit fra vmquhile Arnald'
vanstakinburghe iiijor s' g' and quyt of ale vthir Somes clamyt
be his procuratouris

The saide day Jonhne thomsone gravnt ij obligacionis producit in Juge
ment be procuratouris of the executouris of vmquhile Arnald' vanstakingburghe
tharof ane contenit Sex li' g' and x s' g' and ane vthir four' li' g' xvj s' and
vij g' allegit the saide Somes pait and askit ane day to be
assignit to him to preif his pament and the aldirman and balyeis
assignit to him monunday that next cumis to preif his pament
with his avne consent

The saide day the belman at commavnd of the aldirman and balyeis passit
throw the haill tone' and warnit and chargit ale nichbouris of this burghe
to Cum to the tolbutht for the gude and defens' of thar heretage

The saide day Alexander angosone quyt of ale Soumes clamyt and
follouit be the procuratouris of the executouris of vmquhile vanstakinburghe
of the quhilkis the saide Alexander askit Instrument vndir the Secret
Sale witnes Alexander chamer of murchile Alexander menyes John colisone
thomas prat patrik rede sere Androw chamer and philp Dunbrek

The saide day the aldirman ande balyeis ordanit Androw
nachty sergeand to warne patrik grige to Comper one mo
nunday to ansuer' perempturlie to Antonius lanveris procuratouris to the
executouris of vmquhile Arnald' Wanstakingburghe for the wrangvis'
haldin fra him of x rinsche guthlingis becaus' he was
oftymes warnit and nocht comperit

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die
maij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit settir
day that next cumis to Alexander sanchar' to comper befor tham
within the tolbutht to ansuer' perempturlie to the procuratouris of the
executouris of vmquhile Arnald' Wanstakinburghe for the wranguis'
haldin fra thame of j li' g'

The saide day patrik grige was follouit be the procuratouris of the
executouris of vmquhile Arnald' Wanstakinburghe for the wranguis'
haldin fra thame of x rinsche guthtlingis quhilkis was put to
the decision' of thar personis Jonhne of Culane John Wormet Androw
murray eldar Johne menyeis William Kintor' Robert crage William
andirsone eldar Androw muresone Androw murray yongar John blak
Richerd litstar' James Kennarty george byssat and Alexander nachty
quhilkis riplie avisit the gret aithis suorne deponitclarit be the moutht
of Johne of Culan forspekar that the saide patrik sal content demi ane
ros' nobill to the said procuratouris and quyt of ale the said x rinsche
guthtlingis

The saide day It was deliuerit be the saide assis' Immediatlie
precedent be the moutht of the saide Jonhne of Culane that michilet
ghenes franchman sale pay x frankis to James of Kennarty eldar

The saide day Jonhne thomsone grantit him avand to the procuratouris of
the executouris of vmquhile Arnalde vanstakinburghe' four' li' gretis
viij s' g' Sex gr' flandris money

The saide day the xvj s' g' clamit be the procuratouris of the saide
executouris avand' be the saide Jonhne thomsone quhilk he allegis
pait be ane Cedull producit be him in Jugement is continewit
be the aldirman and balyeis to Settirday that next cumis
that It may be vndirstandin gif the said bile be sufficiente
preif or' nocht for the said xvj s' g'

The saide Jonhne Stevin grantit him avand to the executouris of Arnald'
vanstakinburghe xxvj s' g' flandris money Ande allegit that he
hed pait and deliuerit to the saide Arnalde vijxx futuale iiij ottir
skinnis iij dakir' of gate skinnis and ij fovmarte skinnis in pament of
the saide xxvj s' g' askit ane day to be assignit to him to
preyf the saide gudis pait Ande the aldirman and balyeis assignit
the law day next eftir the Natiuite of crist Immediate hereftir
to the saide Jonhe to preyf the saide gudis pait befor thame and
falyeinge of his preif to pay the saide xxvj s' g'

The saide day comperit philp Dunbrek sergeand and complenyeit to
the aldirman and balyeis that Jonhne talyour' burges of the saide burghe
hed' stribulit him wranguyslie and Wille rolland his seruand'
in the execucion of his office beseking thame of remede of
Justice And' the said' balyeis accusit the saide Jonhne in forme of law
for the wranguis' stribulance of the said' philpe officiar' and his saide
seruand' in the execucion of thar office quhilkis the saide Jonhne
denyit And' in continent with thar' consentis the saide action' was
put to the decisione of ane assis' of thir personis vndir writin
that is to say Dauid mathesone gilbert menyeis patrik rede
Jonhne Westland' Richerd hill eldar' thomas rollande Jonhne
grige Richerd' hill yongar' Alexander angousone Androw Kymdy
and Jonhne Crome' quhilkis riplie avisit the gret' aithis suorne
fand' and deliuerit the saide Jonhne talyour' In ane Amerciament
of the court for the wranguis' stribulance of the saide philip
officiar' and William rolland' his seruand' in the execucion of his
office and to Amend' as law will and forber' in tyme tocum
and thai quyt of ale strubulance of the saide Jonhne gevin for dome
be the moutht of Jonhne Williamsone dempstar' of the
saide Courte

The saide day comperit Alexander chamer yongar ane of the balyeis
of Abirdene ande complenyeit to the aldirman and balyeis that
Jonhne talyour' burges of the said' burghe hed' wranguislie
stribulit him and disobeyt him in the execucion of his office
quhilk he denyit ande furthtwith the saide actione was pvt
to the decisione of the assis' of the personis immediatlie
befor writin quhilkis riplie avisit w the gret aithis suorne
the richtis ande resonnis of batht the saide partiis herde seyne
ande vndirstandin fande and deliuerit the saide Jonhne talyour'
In ane amerciament of the Court be the moutht of Dauid matheson'
forspekar' of the saide assis' for the wranguis' disobeyinge
of the saide Alexander chamer bailye in the execucion of his office
And' to amend as law and to forber' in tyme to Cum And the saide
balye quyt of ale strubulance of the saide Jonhne And' this
gevin for dome be the moutht of Johne Williamsone dempstar
of the saide Courte

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo
die maij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne low grantit him awand' to the executouris
of vmquhile Arnalde Wanstakinburghe four' pundis gretis
of flandris money eftir the tenor' of his obligacion producit
and Schevin in Jugement be the procuratouris of the saide executouris
quhilkis contenit in it Selff ix li g' and xviij g' and allegit
fiwe li' g' and xviii g' of the saide obligacion pait and askit
ane lauchfule day to preywe his pament and the aldirman
and balyeis assignit to him the law day eftir the next yule
the Natiuite of gode to preif his pament and falyeinge tharof
to be condempnit in the saide fywe li' g' and xviij g' eftir
the tenor' of the saide obligacion

add.foreign: t al talyour with thome chamer talyouris

div.p:
Eodem die thomas talyour' familiaris thome chamer scissoris
amerciatur pro perturbio cristine Wellame Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt

The saide day the actionis persevit be the procuratouris of the executouris of
vmquhile Arnald vanstakinburghe' agannis Alexander sanchar'
and Jonhne thomsone is continevit to monunday that next cumis
eftir the tenor of the akis obefor' but preiudice tile ony party

Worschipfule ser I recommand my to yow with ale my hert and wit
ye that in the last bill thar war ye awin me the Some
of alevin li' xiij s' s' j g' j 3 g' tharapone haue I salde your
pok of woll for xiiij marke weit iiijor waw iiij naile the
Some is sex li' viij s' and vii g' say ar ye avin me the
some of fiwe li' iiijor s' vj g' nocht ellis as now the haly
gast haue you in kepin writin in the fer' the xij day of Junij
anno lxxxxij your' frend Arnalde Wanstakinburghe Tile a
worthie man Jonhne thomsone burges of Abirdene

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Wilyeam
blinsel forspekar' that Androw muresone is avand' to the procuratouris
of the executouris of vmquhile Arnalde vanstakinburghe alevin s' g'
and vj g'

The saide day Androw muresone allegit that Arnald Vanstakin
burghe hed' resavit of his vijxx and v Skinnis and restis avin
him pament of the samyn quhilk he suld preyve

Eodem die thomas tailyour familiaris thome chamyr' scissoris
conuictus fuit per assisam pro communi perturbatore et preliatore ex ore Willelmi
blinsele et cetera

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die maij
anno quo supra

The saide day the haile consale ande communite warnit ande
Circualie Inquerit be Alexander' chamer bailye Ilkane mane
be him selff grantit ande opinly declarit that thai walde
defende thar' heretage batht with thar personis and gudis clamit
and persevit be Androw Wode And' thir personis vndir writin
that is to say Alexander rede aldirman sere Jonhne ruthirfurd Alexander
chamer the fadir Alexander menyeis Dauid menyeis Jonhne Culane Jhon'
Colysone thomas prat

The xiij day of maij the yer' forsaid' Alexander Sanchar' grantit
the obligacion producit be the procuratouris of the executouris of vmquhile van
stakinburghe contening xxtj s' and v g' flemys money eftir as the
money hed cours' the tyme of the date of the said' obliga
cion' Ande allegeand' him to haue acquitance and to schew
the samyn one the law day next eftir the fest of Natiuite
of crist Immediate hereftir follouing and falyeing in the bringand'd' overwrites 'g'.'
of the said acquitance to pay the said money

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvj die maij anno quo supra nonagesimo 3o 4o

Eodem die Johannes allirdes de eodem fecit constituit creauit et
ordinauit Alexandrum menyeis et Thomam prat coniunctim et divisim suos
legittimos procuratores ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum xlv li' et xvij d'
monete scocie et bona iure hereditario Johanni malisone contingen' et de receptis
acquitand' Et si necesse fuerit agend' defendend' prosequend' promit
ten' de Rato et grato Judicio Cisti et Judicata soluere in
vberiore forma procuratorij et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjmo
die maij anno quo supra

add.foreign: penes contribucionem concessam pro defensione hereditatis sue

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman balyeis consale and communite
gathreit be the premunicion of the hand'bell grantit one
thar' avne fre will to gif ane contribucion of fourty
markis to the part of thar' expensis that ar' chosin to
be commissaris to the defens' of thar' heretage clamit be
Androw Wode thai beand' Circualy Inquerit be Dauid mar'
balye and philp Dunbrek sergeand' And thai chesit gilbert
menyeis William futhes Alexander gray Richerd Waus and Johne
Waus to extent the saide xl merkis throw the haill tone
be thar' aithis and conscience eftir the faculte of thar gudis

The saide day the haill tone chesit Alexander red aldirman sere Jonhne
ruthirfurde of tarlane Alexander chamer of murchill Alexander menyeis Jonhne
Colisone commissaris to pas tile Edinburghe to defend' thar heretage
clamit be Androw Wode and ordanit ane commissione vndir the
commone Sele to be gevin to thame for that matir and ale vthiris summonce
beand' apone the tone

The saide day the haill tone' ordanit the officiaris of the tone'
to pas' ande tak away the nethis of the wattir of Done for
the maile becaus' the masonnis of the kirkwerk left thar'
werk in defalt of pament of thar' malys

The saide day the haill tone grantit and gaf to the aldirman
Alexander rede ale the takis that he may lauchfullie recouere
pertening to thame beand' in thar' generall assedacion becaus'
of the gret trubull Sustenit be him in the tak Set to him
be the tone

The saide day Jonhne of Culane grantit ane writ contening
fiwe pundis gretis producit in Jugement be the procuratouris of the tutoris of the barnis and executouris
of vmquhile Arnalde vanstakinburghe Ande allegit the saide
Some pait and askit ane lauchfull day to preywe his
allegeance Ande the aldirman and balyeis assignit to the saide
Jonhne the law day eftir the fest of Natiuite of god' next
eftir folloing the date of this ak befor thame and falyeinge
tharof to pay the saide fyve lib' g'
